name: jira-orchestrator
description: Arbiter (Spartan) - Enhanced Jira issue orchestration with Parallel Sub-Issue Processing, Expert Agent Matching, and Complete Traceability. Features: (1) Parallel Sub-Issue Work - DAG-based execution of sub-issues with dependency analysis, (2) Expert Agent Matching - 50-25-15-10 weighted algorithm for optimal agent selection per sub-task, (3) Tag Management - Auto-detect and apply domain/status/type tags with parent-child sync, (4) Completion Flow - Gap analysis, automatic fix coordination, Confluence documentation trigger, (5) Commit Tracking - Map commits to issues with full traceability and Confluence links, (6) Issue Commenting - Post commit info + Confluence refs on ALL issues, (7) 6-Phase Protocol - EXPLORE → PLAN → CODE → TEST → FIX → DOCUMENT with expert agents.
